title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel about a young Andalusian shepherd who sets out on a journey to find his personal legend.

title: The Great Expectations
author: Charles Dickens
description: A coming-of-age novel depicting the life of an orphan named Pip and his pursuit of great expectations.

title: Moby-Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: An epic adventure novel revolving around Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt down the white whale, Moby Dick.

title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
author: Mark Twain
description: A classic novel following the mischievous adventures of Tom Sawyer in a small town on the Mississippi River.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
author: Oscar Wilde
description: A novel exploring the pursuit of pleasure and the consequences of a man's immoral actions.

title: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
description: An epic historical novel set against the backdrop of the Napoleonic Wars and exploring themes of love, war, and society.

title: Jane Eyre
author: Charlotte Brontë
description: A bildungsroman following the life of Jane Eyre, a young orphan who becomes a governess and finds love.

title: The Odyssey
author: Homer
description: An ancient Greek epic poem recounting the adventures of Odysseus during his journey home from the Trojan War.

title: The Brothers Karamazov
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
description: A philosophical novel exploring themes of morality, faith, and the nature of human existence.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
author: Alexandre Dumas
description: An adventure novel following the life of Edmond Dantès, who seeks revenge against those who wronged him.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where individuality is suppressed and independent thought is forbidden.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A classic novel depicting racial injustice in a small Southern town through the eyes of a young girl.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A coming-of-age novel following the disillusioned teenage protagonist, Holden Caulfield, as he navigates life and society.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel exploring societal norms, love, and marriage in 19th-century England.
